Subject: Progress of Steve Bieser
Dear Sir,
Steve Bieser has nothing more to prove at A Cedar Rapids Reds!
He has an AVG of .317 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
